name: GetOnTheCouch
overview:
GetOnTheCouch.com offers peer-to-peer guidance for those who are involved in romantic relationships. Whether you are just friends, on the hunt, dating, committed, engaged, married, taking a break, separated, or divorced - The Couch can assist!

The Couch Concept was born by Co-Founder, Eric Weisholtz, who recognized a need for relationship support amongst his family and friends who were already under the attention of Certified Counselors, Psychologists, or Psychiatrists. Repeatedly, Eric witnessed people paying for advice, only to gain few, or no positive results. Consequently, he decided to create an online community where members could gain valuable insight from fellow Couch Comrades who have similar experiences to draw upon.

The Couch Community is available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. All the guidance and companionship you need is just a click away. This is your online forum to ask, answer and contribute as much, or as little as you want.

And…IT’S ANONYMOUS!

Discover solutions to your critical relationship problems.

Help others by disclosing your unique views and experiences.

Read top online articles about dating, marriage and relationships.

Build your Couch Community of chosen Advisers and Advisees.

Release your anger and frustration regarding the opposite sex.

Participate in meaningful relationship surveys for public broadcast.

So Get-On-The-Couch for Real Help with Real Issues, where a Comfy Cushion is Available at All Times!
